description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to work with VSD, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX, VTX, XPS, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	Features
DIAGRAM-33155 - Creating Geom sections for connectors to correctly rendering them
DIAGRAM-25948 - [Connectors] Provide an easy way to add connectors
DIAGRAM-33164 - Implement possibility to connect shapes by Line-curve connectors
DIAGRAM-33165 - Provide layout shapes on the page in Radial style
DIAGRAM-33166 - Provide layout shapes on the page in Circular style

Enhancements
DIAGRAM-33153 - Recalculate coordinates of connection points for newly created shape (if shape's size was changed)
DIAGRAM-33158 - Creating Geom sections for connector by parsing formulas
DIAGRAM-33157 - Calculating coordinates of the ends of connector after connect shapes (functions PAR and PNT in visio)
DIAGRAM-33159 - Support creating Geom sections for connector for Autolayout feature
DIAGRAM-33156 - Creating and filling XForm1D for connectors from master's shape

Bugs
DIAGRAM-33142 - Unable to load VSD
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
